Summary: Random pattern of approx 10 flashing lights formed triangle shape
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in College Station
There were no other sightings in College Station on or around February 6th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home from basketball game at night.... noticed approximately 10 flashing lights that first appeared as stars in the sky. Lights proceeded to manuver in circular patterns to form one triangle shape. Lost view of lights due to trees, but a after driving ten seconds, triangle lights reappeared at a considerale distance away from original location (miles).
